author: bgw
message:
fix(turbopack): Use vergen-gitcl instead of shadow-rs (or vergen-git2) for napi and next-api crates to fix stale git lock files (#76889)

This does not depend on libgit2 which apparently breaks our builds on
some platforms. Instead it uses the git CLI using my PR:
https://github.com/rustyhorde/vergen/pull/406

Original PR: https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/76773
Revert: https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/76879

Manually triggered CI run to try to build all platforms:
https://github.com/vercel/next.js/actions/runs/13711866131
